channel.title: Erc20 on Ed Zynda - Coder, Hacker, Superhero
channel.description: Recent content in Erc20 on Ed Zynda - Coder, Hacker, Superhero

item.title: Create Your Own Cryptcurrency On Ethereum Part 1
item.description: In this video, I show you just how easy it is to create your own custom token on the Ethereum blockchain. I also explain ERC20, the standard that most custom tokens follow.
